categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Knifes Edge was a Mansk-class light escort frigate used by the Rebel Alliance. It was one of many ships used by the Rebel Fleet in their fight against the Galactic Empire.

Knifes Edge was armed with six dual light laser cannons mounted in turrets, and a single ion cannon. The ship required a crew of five to operate, and could carry thirty additional troops, as well as eighty metric tons of cargo, and had supplies for one month. The ship was 100 meters in length, and physically resembled the Mansk-class light escort frigate, to which class it belonged.
Knifes Edge was built by Tallaani Shipyards, and used by the Rebel Alliance some time during the Galactic Civil War.
